description: This pipe upgrades the postgres db used by isd. The script that upgrades is in github. Before you run this pipe, make sure the byos-set-up-pipe and byos-postgres-db-backup are run and the secrets for github and postgres are created. Choose the parameters accordingly. more info at https://github.com/OpsMx/byos/blob/main/Postgres/Readme.md

args:
set +x
source /repo/environment
export source=${parameters.source}
cd /repo/data-migration/
ls -ltra 
if [ "$source" == "3.9" ]; then

echo "upgrading  v3.9.x to v3.10"
export cmd="python3 migration_v3.9.x_to_v3.10.py visibilitydb $host platformdb $host opsmx $host oesdb $host auditdb $host $port admin $saporpassword"
echo $cmd
 
export source="3.10"


elif [ "$source" == "3.10" ]; then
echo "upgrading  v3.10.x to v3.11"

    export cmd="python3 migration_v3.10.x_to_v3.11.py auditdb $host opsmx $host http://oes-audit-service:8097 $port"
     
      echo $cmd
      
      export source="3.11"

elif [ "$source" == "3.11" ]; then
echo "upgrading  v3.11 to v3.11.1"

    export cmd="python3 migration_v3.11_to_v3.11.x.py opsmx $host $port"
    
    
    echo $cmd
    
    export source="3.11.1"
    
elif [ "$source" == "3.11.1" ]; then
echo "upgrading  v3.11.1 to v3.12.4"

    export cmd="python3 migration_v3.11_to_v3.12.py platformdb $host oesdb $host  opsmx $host auditdb $host visibilitydb $host $port"
    
    echo $cmd
    
    export source="3.12"
    
elif [ "$source" == "3.12.4" ]; then
echo "upgrading  v3.12.4 to v3.12.5"

    export cmd="python3 migration_v3.12.4_to_v3.12.5.py opsmx $host $port $pguser $pgpassword"
    
    echo $cmd
    
    export source="3.12.5"
    
elif [  "$source" == "3.12.5" ]; then

 echo "upgrading  v3.12.5 to v3.12.6"

    export cmd="python3 migration_v3.12.5_to_v3.12.6.py auditdb $host visibilitydb $host  platformdb $host $port $pguser $pgpassword"
    
    echo $cmd
    
    export source="3.12.6"
     
else
   
   echo "Some went wrong in mapping Migration script"
    
fi
$cmd
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then  
echo "Migration of Postgress DB is sucessfull into your Database"
else
echo "Migration of Postgress DB failed"
exit 1
fi
containers.name: script

initContainers.name: kube
